TEXT.TITLE: MCKESSON <MCK> SELLS CULINARY ACADEMY
TEXT.BODY: McKesson Corp said it sold the California Culinary Academy of San Francisco to an investor group headed by the academy's president, Fred Seymour, for undisclosed terms. The 400-student academy was founded nine years ago and was acquired in 1982 by McKesson. The company said it sold it because it no longer fits with its business direction. Reuter
